blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Here you can find a collection of my thoughts on various topics. I try to write about things that I find interesting, and that I think others might find interesting as well. I hope you enjoy reading them!
blog.comingSoon: More articles coming soon. Stay tuned!

hero.description: AI Engineer | Full Stack Developer and coding the future

about.title: AI Research, Developer, Designer, and Innovator
about.intro: Hello! I'm Dimas Tri Mulyo, an AI Engineer with expertise in web development. I am passionate about integrating artificial intelligence to create innovative and user-friendly web solutions.
about.focus: My focus is on making web development faster and more accessible. As an AI Engineer, I'm now expanding into backend development to grow as a full-stack developer.
about.quote: I was reminded of what is perhaps the fundamental rule of technological progress: if something can be done, it probably will be done, and possibly already has been.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcasing selected projects in AI Engineering and Web Development.

netra.title: Netra - Literature Review Assistant
netra.description: An AI-powered assistant for literature reviews. Upload documents and let our OCR & Rabin-Karp algorithms instantly find relevant sections for your research.

house.title: High Accuracy House Prediction
house.description: An intelligent Machine Learning model designed to predict house prices with high accuracy by analyzing property features, location, and market trends.

pothole.title: Road Pothole Detection
pothole.description: A Deep Learning-based Computer Vision system (YOLO) for real-time road damage detection to facilitate efficient infrastructure maintenance.

dss.title: Decision Support System (DSS)
dss.description: An interactive Decision Support System designed to assist in selecting the best alternatives using complex data analysis methods WP (Weight Product).

portfolio.title: Modern Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern portfolio website built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, featuring smooth animations and a fully responsive design.

service.subtitle: I offer a range of services to help you bring your ideas to life, from web development to AI-powered solutions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy. This portfolio is a demonstration of my work and skills. Here is how we handle data:
privacy.dataCollection: We do not collect personal data from visitors. Authentication (Google/GitHub) is used solely for the Guestbook/Comments feature to prevent spam.
privacy.auth: Authentication is handled by Supabase. We only store your email and name to display your comments. We do not sell or share this data.
privacy.cookies: We use minimal cookies necessary for authentication and site functionality involved with Supabase.
privacy.contact: If you have questions, please contact me via the form on the Contact page.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: This website is a personal portfolio and blog.
disclaimer.educational: Some content is for educational purposes. Code snippets are provided 'as is' without warranty.
disclaimer.guarantee: While I strive for accuracy, I cannot guarantee that all information is perfectly up to date or error-free.
disclaimer.links: This site contains links to external websites (e.g. GitHub, LinkedIn). I am not responsible for the content of those external sites.
